Docs.summary: Enables data-bound control containers to identify a data item object for simplified data-binding operations.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Container classes that implement the IDataItemContainer interface can specify which of their properties identifies the data item for data-binding operations, such as late binding with the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataBinder> class.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to use the IDataItemContainer interface. The `SimpleSpreadsheetControl` is a control that displays tabular-style data, similar to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control. It contains a set of `SimpleSpreadsheetRow` objects.
The `SimpleSpreadsheetRow` class is a container class that implements the IDataItemContainer interface. Although in this example the data item property is intuitively named `Data`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer.DataItem%2A> property can be implemented to map to any property or return value of a method.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The DataItem property identifies an object that is used in data-binding operations and late-binding expressions.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to implement a type that uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer> interface. The `SimpleSpreadsheetRow` class is a container class with a member named `Data`. It implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer> interface by mapping the `Data` property to the DataItem property. Simplified data-binding expressions can bind to the data object using the DataItem property.
[!code-cs[System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer_1#3](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/p-system.web.ui.idataite_2_1.cs)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer_1#3](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/p-system.web.ui.idataite_2_1.vb)]

Docs.value: An representing the index of the data item in the data source.

remarks.format:
## Remarks In implementing classes such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>, the DataItemIndex property is used to determine the index of the data item bound to the control from the data source. The DataItemIndex property does not refer to the index of the data item as displayed by the data control.
